name: ClickSpeed (alser)
description:
Immerse yourself in a dream world, where your reflexes and precision will be put to the test throughout 10 levels and if you want more, the infinite mode will give it to you.

In ClickSpeed, speed is everything, if you miss the target you lose speed, maintaining it will give you a headache but the satisfaction of beating the level will make up for it.

This experience has been developed for mobile phone, therefore, the experience in this is better.
